notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.E., T.G. and A.R. developed the assay while providing the facilities and mosquitoes for testing. J.S., Q.W., A.R. and W.R. planned the study. X.D. and Q.W. purified the nepetalactone isomers from the crude essential oils used in the assay. J.S. and W.R. developed these new unique catnip cultivars. W.R., Q.W. and J.S. analyzed the essential oil composition; and W.R., J.S. and A.R. wrote the manuscript as well as prepared the figures and tables with all authors reviewing and contributing to final manuscript.
